survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
yeah
cool! i'm at the starting point
there's a twig to my left leading to a small island with a tiger. where to, amigo?
cross the stick
alright, crossed the twig! now i'm on the island with the tiger
¿hacia dónde ahora?
do you see a different twig leading across the water to an island with a parrot on it?
got it! there's no twig, but i see a big island with a parrot to my south-west
should i swim across?
walk to the south west corner of the island
done! i'm on the south-west corner of the island with the tiger
¿ahora que?
cross the gap to the island with the parrot
jumped and landed safely on the island with the parrot! this one's cute! where to next, buddy?
walk around the parrot, between the parrot and the elephant
okay, roger that! i am now between the parrot and elephant on the big island
¿Qué sigue amigo?
walk towards the two big rocks to the east
easy peasy! i'm now at the 3 rocks on the eastern part of the island
what's next, mate?
cross the rocks and walk towards the frog
jumped over the rocks! now, i'm on a new island with a frog
what's our next move, pal?
walk to the frog
done! i've reached mr
rana. ¿Qué sigue en la lista?
do you see an aligator to your west
yup! there's a big crocodile to my left
should i approach it?
walk across the crocodile's back onto the rock to the north
brave move! but i made it across
Ahora estoy en una roca al norte del cocodrilo.
walk to the west and cross the rocks onto the island with the giraffe
did as told
i'm now on an island with a tall-looking giraffe! where to now?
cross the twig to the southeast to the island with the snake
¡Cruzó la ramita y ahora se enfría con una serpiente en esta isla! ¿el próximo paso?
continue east to the treasure
a treasure trove is in sight! i'm walking towards it
it's mine! *finished*! we did it, buddy!

chat.msg: hey, estas listo?
yes
cool
take a few steps left, go under the bench and cross the trail towards the florist stand. stop before you reach the stand
ok i'm slightly northeast of the stand
¡excelente! ahora, haz un rápido giro en U hacia la izquierda, cruza el sendero nuevamente y regresa en dirección al perro blanco.
i'm not sure where to go
no worries! go straight over the branch, heading south
you'll see another white dog chilling near a red and white picnic setup. head towards the dog
i am right near the dog
¡perfecto! Ahora, camina sobre la alfombra, apenas toca el cuenco de bayas y sigue hacia el oeste, amigo.
what
sorry about that! go over the mat towards the bowl of berries
stay on a westward track
i am on the bowl of berries now
awesome! now, you're gonna see another wooden branch crossing the river
Quiero que lo cruces, pero esta vez ve al norte.
i crossed the branch
nice one! alright, when you reach the other side, avoid the green bush and go around it from the right
keep on until you get to the florist stand
i am east of the florist stand now
great! now, turn your steps to the left, go below the stand and keep on until you reach a big bridge
Habrá dos personas andando en bicicleta.
i'm right next to the people on the bike
perfect! keep heading west past the bridge
right after, you'll spot two seniors reading newspapers on a bench
i'm right at the geezers
¡Frío! Muévete hacia el sur unos pasos ahora, entre esas encantadoras personas y la rama de madera.
what
sorry for that confusion, mate! from the old people, go a few steps south towards a green bush near the end of the wooden branch
you got this!
ok i'm there
genial! ahora, gira hacia el este y camina entre la rama y el arbusto.
what
sorry again! i mean, head east between the branch and the bush
just follow the path

chat.msg: hey, estas listo?
where are you now
hey there! i'm at the tent in the north
where am i headed next?
go south and walk between the dog and the rocks
alright, i see a fire to the right of the dog and a red mushroom
¿hacia dónde sigue?
walk under the dog, then between the dog and the fire, then between the mushroom and the fire
hecho! estoy cerca del auto azul
now what?
walk towards the blue car, then when you reach the blue car, head west and follow the road south until you get to the telescope
i'm at the telescope now
Veo algunas rocas y una casa de madera al oeste. ¿donde ahora?
walk between the telescope and the bush until you reach the road, and then follow the road until the curve. then stop.
siguendo tus instrucciones, terminé en las rocas
head north west to the small gap in the boulders, then climb atop the boulders to the west
hopping over these rocks, i can see the wooden house
*finished*

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
only english from here on out please
okie dokie! you see those three palm trees? start by heading southwest under the first one
gire a la derecha en el segundo, luego gire rápidamente a la izquierda antes de llegar al tercero, en dirección sur. ¿Cómo lo estamos haciendo hasta ahora?
i'm under the first tree
cool! now turn right at the second tree, then quickly turn left before the third one, heading south
how's the view there?
i'm looking at a dog on my left
¡ese es! Gire ligeramente a la izquierda alrededor de ese adorable cachorro, luego gire nuevamente a la derecha en dirección sur.
english
aw, cute! swing a bit left around that adorable pup, then veer back to the right heading south
how's it going so far?
good
alright! keep going until you see a big rock to your left and a small one to your right
pase justo entre ellos. ¿Ya puedes ver el agua?
which direction am i meant to be walking right now
you should be moving towards the ocean, buddy
can you see it?
yeah
nice! now face the big red crab man, make a right, and continue along the big rock in the water towards the west
¡No te mojes demasiado los pies!
i'm on the big rock
great! keep going west until you spot a medium rock
see any sharks?
yes
alright, don't panic! swing a hard right at the shark
¡Lo estás haciendo bien, amigo!
now what
you're doing great! now get back on land, pass between the medium rock and a multicolored ball, and head on north
you see it?
yes
¡impresionante! Ahora gira ligeramente a la izquierda y dirígete hacia el noroeste, pasa entre una tienda de campaña roja a la izquierda y un gran altavoz a tu derecha.
english bro
awesome! now swerve a bit left, heading northwest, go between a red tent on your left and a big speaker on your right
see them?
yeah
perfect! now arc around the tent and head south. you'll see the water again, but don't go in
Gire a la derecha en la orilla en dirección oeste, justo debajo de un kayak rojo. ¿entiendo?
ok
cool! now make a sharp right, head north along the kayak till you reach a small green bush
you've made it!
